BBEX3.A.LBP.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Lebanon / USD 1 = LBP ... (middle)
Source: Banque du Liban, Beirut (also Reuters in 1983 and 1984).

Methodology: Until 1982, calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates, and from 1983 to 1995 on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates. From 1996, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end middle rates, from September 1999 de facto exchange rate anchor to the US dollar (USD 1 = LBP 1507.50).
